actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat payments under the Conservation Reserve Program as rentals from real estate.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat conservation reserve program payments as real estate rentals and thus excluded from consideration in self-employment net earnings. Amends the Social Security Act to treat such payments similarly for purposes of old, age, survivors, and disability insurance (OASDI) benefits.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat payments under the Conservation Reserve Program as rentals from real estate.
